title: Constitution to be supreme law

content.text: Subject to the provisions of sub-articles (7) and (9) of article 47 and of article 66 of this Constitution, if any other law is inconsistent with this Constitution, this Constitution shall prevail and the other law shall, to the extent of the inconsistency, be void.

amendmentHistory.description: Amendment regarding the provisions of article 47 and 66

crossReferences.description: Reference to provisions regarding freedom of expression
Reference to provisions regarding parliamentary procedure

notes: This article establishes the supremacy of the Constitution over other laws in Malta.
